title: 6 dead, 9 injured in Wuxi gas leak
text:
By CANG WEI | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-13 15:00

Six people died and nine people were injured in an explosion caused by a gas leak in Wuxi, East China's Jiangsu province, on Sunday morning.

An explosion occurred at 11 am at a snack bar on Xinyang Road in the city's Ehu township.

Fifteen people were sent to hospital immediately and six were later declared dead at the hospital after treatment.

According to the Wuxi government WeChat, the nine injured do not face life-threatening injuries.
description: Six people were killed and nine others injured in a restaurant gas explosion in east China's Jiangsu province Sunday, local authorities said.
